Description: Ring foot and body sherd of large Egyptian black ware pottery bowl; dark brown Nile silt fabric with mica inclusions; black slip on exterior and interior; irregular rouletting around tondo; inscription on underside.
Bibliographic references: Petrie 1886 / Naukratis. Part I., 1884-85 (pl. XXXIV, no. 622)
Bernand 1970 / Le Delta égyptien d'après les textes grecs, i: les confins libyques (p. 673, no. 317)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (IC.069)
